title: Join
content:
Welcome to Aphantasia!

Before diving into the graph realm, there are a few things you might wanna know first.

Let's start with the basics.

title: What is a thought?
content:
Philosophers and dreamers have drowned centuries into this question. But, for our purposes, a **thought is a node in a graph**.

Every thought has a title, content, color, shape, connections to other thoughts... but most importantly **a thought is an imprint of someone's mind**.

title: A rant about words
content:
What the hell is __bimontly__? I needed to know whether it means twice a month or once every two months. Here is the definition I found:

> done, produced, or __occurring twice a month or every two months__.

What a waste of characters. Useless garbage word, get rid of it, I hate it.
